name: Up All Night (Alpha Demo)
description:
THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA DEMO MODE. PLEASE STAY TUNED!
(Full release anticipated mid-October, 2020.)

Play through roughly 4500 words in Up All Night's alpha demo. This demo explores the first 10 - 20 minutes of gameplay, including a few interactive choices and character introductions. The mystery, however, is just beginning.

----------

Stranded in the remote cabin that was supposed to serve as a weekend getaway, recent high school grad Nick is on his own to explore the surrounding backwoods.

Unfortunately things take a dark turn when he stumbles upon a gruesome scene.

Accompanied by two new local acquaintances, Nick’s first goal is to uncover the mystery of what haunts the woods. His second is to survive it.

Unearth secrets hidden between the trees.

Solve a murder.

Confront what awaits in the darkness.

Whatever transpires, you’re guaranteed to be up all night.

 WARNING: This game incorporates mature themes including physical violence, contemplation of suicide, and visual and written depictions of gore.

FEATURES:
     Seven unique character sprites with over 100 'expressions'
     Five unlockable illustrations
     Original soundtrack
     25,000+ words
     Seven endings

CREDITS:
Terra Babcock - Story dev, narrative design, writing, programming, editing
Johan Faulstich - Story dev, character design, sprites, illustration, backgrounds
Michael Cooper - Original soundtrack, audio editing, editing
Sound effects provided by Audio Alchemist and Finnolia Productions

Follow the devs on twitter at FiendishFiction!
